pkgmetadata.longdescription: Htool is an implementation of hierarchical matrices (cf. this reference or this one), it was written to test Domain Decomposition Methods (DDM) applied to Boundary Element Method (BEM). It provides: * routines to build hierarchical matrix structures (cluster trees, block trees, low-rank matrices and block matrices), * parallel matrix-vector and matrix-matrix product using MPI and OpenMP, * preconditioning techniques using domain decomposition methods, the possibility to use Htool with any generator of coefficients (e.g., your own BEM library), * an interface with HPDDM for iterative solvers, * GUI and several service functions to display informations about matrix structures and timing.
